definition: essence/extract/vitality/energy/semen/sperm/mythical goblin spirit/highly perfected/elite/the pick of sth/proficient (refined ability)/extremely (fine)/selected rice (archaic)
Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods

sentences.english: Astute salesmen know how to invest emotionally.
sentences.chinese: 精明的商人懂得如何感情投资。

sentences.english: Culinarily , sashimi represents the Japanese cultural appreciation of subtlety.
sentences.chinese: 从烹饪上说，生鱼片代表了日本的精明文化价值观。

sentences.english: A sagacious businessman seldom fails in his business.
sentences.chinese: 精明的商人在生意上很少失败。

sentences.english: A golden ring in a swine's snout, a woman fair and foolish.
sentences.chinese: 女人美丽而不精明，犹如套在猪鼻上的金环。

sentences.english: This is why it is so critical to choose your premium features wisely.
sentences.chinese: 这也是为什么你需要精明地选择“高级功能”的原因。

sentences.english: He is a lewd of a dandy, but admits skill, shrewd.
sentences.chinese: 他固然是个好色的纨绔子弟，但身手矫捷，精明能干。

sentences.english: He acts like a politician in a way that he avoid himself from falling into traps.
sentences.chinese: 猴像外家一样圆滑精明，能避免自己陷入困境。

sentences.english: Are these wise, old heads being overlooked?
sentences.chinese: 这些精明的老家伙们被忽视了么？

sentences.english: These hoop earrings are savvy and spunky and love to be worn frequently.
sentences.chinese: 这些箍耳环是精明的，有勇气，喜欢佩戴频繁。

sentences.english: Bachchan is beautiful, talented and also shrewd in business.
sentences.chinese: 巴臣不只才貌兼备，还有精明的生意头脑。

sentences.english: Then Wang Dan, a smart enterprise at the helm, he is not afraid?
sentences.chinese: 那么王石，一位精明的企业掌舵人，他不怕吗？

sentences.english: Millionaire, high-performance bankers on the 73rd floor did not appreciate the interruption.
sentences.chinese: 73楼的百万富翁和精明银行家不喜欢被人打断。

sentences.english: Drouet was not shrewd enough to see that this was not tactful.
sentences.chinese: 杜洛埃不够精明，看不出这么做太没有策略了。

sentences.english: Goebbels was very clever here, too.
sentences.chinese: 戈贝尔在这里又一次很精明。

sentences.english: Denner had a mind as sharp as a needle.
sentences.chinese: 登纳有一副精明的头脑。

definition: rigorous schemes and deep foresight (idiom); astute and circumspect
be smooth and slick (in establishing social relations)
